A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have to review this after seeing its predecessor TROS. If you are a fan of Luke Skywalker and the prequels (lightsaber battles and forms) there will be a few disappointments. With the sequel trilogy done\, it feels that you need to watch the sequel trilogy as a whole. \n\nThe only thing that I would like to be in the story is the 3rd lesson and a few seconds  of screentime for Luke Skywalker and Kylo Ren. It will take a sort of acceptance to the storyflow or decisions of Luke Skywalker in this movie.
